events.name: Attack on Nigerian prison by Boko Haram
events.wd_label: Attack on Nigerian prison by Boko Haram
events.wd_description: The Islamic State claimed responsibility for an attack on a Nigerian prison where approximately 440 inmates escaped, highlighting the ongoing security challenges in the country.
events.description: The Islamic State claimed responsibility for an attack on a Nigerian prison where approximately 440 inmates escaped, highlighting the ongoing security challenges in the country.

events.name: prison attack
events.wd_description: Boko Haram insurgents attacked a medium-security prison to free their members, resulting in one security officer killed and three others injured.
events.description: Boko Haram insurgents attacked a medium-security prison to free their members, resulting in one security officer killed and three others injured.

events.name: prison break
events.wd_description: During the attack, 879 inmates fled the facility, with 443 still at large, four inmates dead, and 16 injured.
events.description: During the attack, 879 inmates fled the facility, with 443 still at large, four inmates dead, and 16 injured.

events.name: President Buhari's response
events.wd_description: President Muhammadu Buhari visited the prison, condemned the attack, and questioned the prison's security system while ordering investigations.
events.description: President Muhammadu Buhari visited the prison, condemned the attack, and questioned the prison's security system while ordering investigations.

events.name: separate attack on presidential convoy
events.wd_description: In a separate incident, the convoy of President Buhari was ambushed on his way to Daura for Islamic festivals, further highlighting the security challenges in Nigeria.
events.description: In a separate incident, the convoy of President Buhari was ambushed on his way to Daura for Islamic festivals, further highlighting the security challenges in Nigeria.

events.name: Car bombing kills daughter of Putin ally
events.wd_label: Car bombing kills daughter of Putin ally
events.wd_description: Darya Dugina, the daughter of prominent ultra-nationalist ideologue Alexander Dugin, was killed in a suspected car bombing outside Moscow. Her father, a close ally of Vladimir Putin, was believed to be the intended target.
events.description: Darya Dugina, the daughter of prominent ultra-nationalist ideologue Alexander Dugin, was killed in a suspected car bombing outside Moscow. Her father, a close ally of Vladimir Putin, was believed to be the intended target.

events.name: car bombing
events.wd_description: An explosive device planted under the car went off, causing the vehicle to catch fire and killing Darya Dugina.
events.description: An explosive device planted under the car went off, causing the vehicle to catch fire and killing Darya Dugina.

events.name: Alexander Dugin's connection to Putin
events.wd_description: Alexander Dugin, known as "Putin's brain," is a prominent ultra-nationalist ideologue with a close relationship with the Russian President.
events.description: Alexander Dugin, known as "Putin's brain," is a prominent ultra-nationalist ideologue with a close relationship with the Russian President.

events.name: investigation by Russian authorities
events.wd_description: Russian forensic and explosive experts are investigating the incident, confirming that Darya Dugina died after the explosion.
events.description: Russian forensic and explosive experts are investigating the incident, confirming that Darya Dugina died after the explosion.

events.name: Ukrainian response
events.wd_description: Ukrainian official Mykhailo Podolyak dismissed accusations of Ukraine's involvement, stating that Ukraine is not a criminal state.
events.description: Ukrainian official Mykhailo Podolyak dismissed accusations of Ukraine's involvement, stating that Ukraine is not a criminal state.

events.name: Zelenskiy vows to recapture Crimea from Russia
events.wd_label: Zelenskiy vows to recapture Crimea from Russia
events.wd_description: President Volodymyr Zelenskiy vowed that Ukraine would recapture its annexed peninsula of Crimea from Russia without consulting other countries, speaking at a news conference in Kyiv.
events.description: President Volodymyr Zelenskiy vowed that Ukraine would recapture its annexed peninsula of Crimea from Russia without consulting other countries, speaking at a news conference in Kyiv.

events.name: Zelenskiy's statement
events.wd_description: President Volodymyr Zelenskiy stated that Ukraine would recapture Crimea from Russia and would not consult with other countries before doing so.
events.description: President Volodymyr Zelenskiy stated that Ukraine would recapture Crimea from Russia and would not consult with other countries before doing so.

events.name: Crimea platform forum
events.wd_description: Zelenskiy made his comments after mass participation by country leaders and international organizations, most of them by video on the Crimea platform, a forum hosted by Ukraine focused on the peninsula.
events.description: Zelenskiy made his comments after mass participation by country leaders and international organizations, most of them by video on the Crimea platform, a forum hosted by Ukraine focused on the peninsula.

events.name: context of Crimea's annexation
events.wd_description: Russia annexed Crimea in 2014 before launching a full-scale invasion in February 2022, seizing parts of Ukraine's Southern Kherson and regions of Zaporizhzhia.
events.description: Russia annexed Crimea in 2014 before launching a full-scale invasion in February 2022, seizing parts of Ukraine's Southern Kherson and regions of Zaporizhzhia.

events.name: Zaporizhzhia nuclear plant crisis
events.wd_description: Zelenskiy addressed the crisis at the Russian-held nuclear plant in Zaporizhzhia, calling for a mission of the International Atomic Energy Agency to the site following recent shelling.
events.description: Zelenskiy addressed the crisis at the Russian-held nuclear plant in Zaporizhzhia, calling for a mission of the International Atomic Energy Agency to the site following recent shelling.

events.name: EV battery supply chain challenges and strategies
events.wd_label: EV battery supply chain challenges and strategies
events.wd_description: The complexities and strategies involved in developing a sustainable EV battery supply chain in the United States, addressing the need for domestic production and alternative sources.
events.description: The complexities and strategies involved in developing a sustainable EV battery supply chain in the United States, addressing the need for domestic production and alternative sources.

events.name: graphite production
events.wd_description: Graphite is a critical material for EV batteries, with the U.S. currently relying on China for production despite having domestic resources.
events.description: Graphite is a critical material for EV batteries, with the U.S. currently relying on China for production despite having domestic resources.

events.name: t: challenges in U.S. production
events.wd_description: The U.S. lacks investment in EV-quality graphite production, making it reliant on Chinese imports despite having domestic resources.
events.description: The U.S. lacks investment in EV-quality graphite production, making it reliant on Chinese imports despite having domestic resources.

events.name: t: synthetic graphite
events.wd_description: Synthetic graphite, made from waste petroleum products, is considered the best approach for long-lasting EV batteries.
events.description: Synthetic graphite, made from waste petroleum products, is considered the best approach for long-lasting EV batteries.

events.name: t: environmental considerations
events.wd_description: Graphite refining involves environmental costs, with newer methods being developed to meet local regulations and reduce impact.
events.description: Graphite refining involves environmental costs, with newer methods being developed to meet local regulations and reduce impact.

events.name: new legislation
events.wd_description: The Inflation Reduction Act and other legislative measures aim to incentivize domestic EV battery production and reduce reliance on Chinese imports.
events.description: The Inflation Reduction Act and other legislative measures aim to incentivize domestic EV battery production and reduce reliance on Chinese imports.

events.name: t: tax credits
events.wd_description: The new bill includes subsidies and tax credits for U.S. drivers to buy EVs, with conditions on manufacturing and raw material sourcing.
events.description: The new bill includes subsidies and tax credits for U.S. drivers to buy EVs, with conditions on manufacturing and raw material sourcing.

events.name: t: IRS determination
events.wd_description: The IRS will determine which vehicles and their supply chains qualify for the new tax credits.
events.description: The IRS will determine which vehicles and their supply chains qualify for the new tax credits.

events.name: t: Defense Production Act
events.wd_description: The Biden administration invoked the Defense Production Act to invest in critical material production and stimulate domestic industries.
events.description: The Biden administration invoked the Defense Production Act to invest in critical material production and stimulate domestic industries.

events.name: securing alternative suppliers
events.wd_description: Efforts to secure alternative suppliers for raw materials and battery components to reduce dependency on Chinese imports.
events.description: Efforts to secure alternative suppliers for raw materials and battery components to reduce dependency on Chinese imports.

events.name: t: friend-shoring agenda
events.wd_description: The U.S. aims to trade with trusted partners, excluding China, to secure supplies for the EV battery supply chain.
events.description: The U.S. aims to trade with trusted partners, excluding China, to secure supplies for the EV battery supply chain.

events.name: t: partnerships with international suppliers
events.wd_description: Partnerships with countries like Australia, Canada, and Korea to secure materials such as lithium, cobalt, and graphite.
events.description: Partnerships with countries like Australia, Canada, and Korea to secure materials such as lithium, cobalt, and graphite.

events.name: innovation and investment
events.wd_description: Investment in new technologies and production facilities to build a domestic EV battery industry and reduce reliance on imports.
events.description: Investment in new technologies and production facilities to build a domestic EV battery industry and reduce reliance on imports.

events.name: t: technological breakthroughs
events.wd_description: Innovations in battery technology, such as new lithium extraction methods and alternative battery chemistries, to improve supply chain sustainability.
events.description: Innovations in battery technology, such as new lithium extraction methods and alternative battery chemistries, to improve supply chain sustainability.

events.name: t: domestic production facilities
events.wd_description: Building new facilities in the U.S. to produce battery cells and packs, aiming to qualify for tax credits and reduce import reliance.
events.description: Building new facilities in the U.S. to produce battery cells and packs, aiming to qualify for tax credits and reduce import reliance.

events.name: t: securing investments
events.wd_description: Attracting investments to expand production capabilities and develop a robust domestic supply chain for EV batteries.
events.description: Attracting investments to expand production capabilities and develop a robust domestic supply chain for EV batteries.
